name: A or B
description:
This is your life. You're just walking down the street, minding your own business. No major decisions to make. Until...

In A or B, you have 7 seconds to decide your fate. Or someone else's. If you don't - if you freeze, or refuse - I'll decide for you. Each decision you make, including doing nothing at all, has dire consequences and may result in your own dramatic...expiration.

Try to keep your kill counter low and your wits about you. After all, it's either A or B.
